website_summaries.verdict: Consider this notebook if you're looking for a table of contents.
pros: Stickers for labeling and table of contents
Great for use with gel pens
cons: Fountain pens and ballpoint pens bleed through the pages

customer_reviews.title: Love these notebooks
customer_reviews.text: I love this notebook. Two years ago I started a bullet journal. I didn’t know if I’d like it so I bought this notebook because it wasn’t as scary as starting in a hardback book. I fell in love with it. I originally got two books and used them up then got a hardback Leuchtturm. I’m finishing my eighth notebook now and have another on the desk waiting for next month. I recently bought more softcover books to have for crochet patterns. I love the way these books are set up. They’re durable and can handle all the punishment I put them through. I will always buy these notebooks because in think they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: vicki sartin

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully designed and classy notebook
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to notebook for personal and professional purposes. It is thoughtfully designed with a cover that looks and feels very classy and professional. The pages are numbered, and there are a few pages in the back that are perforated and can be easily detached if needed. Additionally, there are two page markers and a back pocket that can be used to store small notes or business cards. The only minor issue is that, if you use a pen, ink can be seen through pages on the flip side, but that is dependent on the type of pen you use.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent Notebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this notebook to replace the moleskine notebook I was using as a bullet journal for work. While I still prefer the paper on the moleskine, this was a decent substitute. The paper is rougher than the moleskine, but I do like how the pages are numbered, the outlines, and the date field. I also think I will utilize the table of contents that is at the beginning of the notebook. I would definitely buy again but I wouldn't say this is the quality that I expected for this price range. If you write with small pointed pens you might get annoyed with the scratching it does when you write in this notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: High quality soft cover notebook.
customer_reviews.text: Accepts pencil or ink equally well. Beautiful creamy white paper, with extra-fine, warm grey lines. Nice and heavy, ink doesn't bleed through. Love the elastic band closure, ribbon page markers, pocket in the back, numbered pages. Nicely detailed, a truly useful item. This is the third one I've bought for journalling.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ginocchio

customer_reviews.title: It's my favorite of all the notebooks of this ilk
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite of all the notebooks of this ilk. I think it's more aesthetically appealing than Moleskines and the soft-leather cover is *so* pleasant: just soft enough to allow for flexibility but firm enough to not be floppy. I think I'm a Lechtturm convert for life
customer_reviews.author: Pudge McGibbins

customer_reviews.title: Leuchtturm Medium
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best Notebook today, clean, comfortable, easy to use. I find these better than the others. I keep about a hundred ready to go. If you think the Squares will be a problem for a journal, they are barely visible so it's fine to write in. UPDATE : 1/30/20 For the price, you'd think the softcover would last, but after 7 years the softcover is "flaking" in many parts and the band is outstretched. Dust seems to have "seeped" along into the softcover as well and I can't remove it. The paper is the same though, that's what matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bartok Kinski

customer_reviews.title: Simple but brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Best notebook I've ever bought. I am currently super pissed that I left it on the train in San Francisco. Numbered pages and the table of contents are super helpful, especially when I use the notebook to take notes for multiple different projects. I am also a huge fan of the gridded paper, it lets me take written notes and also draw things out when necessary. Best feature so far though is the spine label sticker. I wish I had these for my old moleskin notebooks; I have a huge stack that I can't tell the difference between because they all look the same.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality, nice format
customer_reviews.text: Love the page numbers and index, graph paper and the material. I was looking for an alternative to Moleskine and I'm happy with these notebooks. Perfect for a bullet journal no matter how minimalist.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These notebooks and this size in particular are great. I love the softcover. This is the 2nd one of purchased in this size. I’ve also purchased the pocket sized with the soft cover. They are very sturdy and will meet your needs. I’ve used pen, pencil and mostly fountain pen and they respond well and don’t bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M Brockway

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sketchbook, it’s been my go to go 6 years! The boxes make it so easy to sketch and also create your own system for note taking. I make calendars, to do lists, everything in these. The lines are not too dark so you can easily just sketch over them. It’s super light, making it great to carry anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Meerbear

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice. I put a pretty patterned paper cover over ...
customer_reviews.text: Just try one. You may find that Moleskines are never the same for you. The Leuchtturm paper is a little nicer and the A5 size gives you a bit more room. I use these in a custom-made traveler's notebook. Very Nice. I put a pretty patterned paper cover over the black using a glue stick and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I love this notebook
customer_reviews.text: I love this notebook. It's a simple concept but just what I needed for my Bullet Journal. I've never spent so much on a notebook before but decided to treat myself to this one. I fell in love with grid notebooks when I went to school in Spain way back in the day. It is hard to find them in local stores. This brings back many happy memories of a fun semester.
customer_reviews.author: ladilynn63

customer_reviews.title: this is the best journal i have even had
customer_reviews.text: can't say it enough, this is the best journal i have even had. It is pricey, which is a huge deterrent to purchasing, but I am so glad I made the investment. I have already purchased more. This is very well made and exceeded my expectations. I love the squared pages and the numbered pages. Perfect for bullet journaling.
customer_reviews.author: complexbex

customer_reviews.title: With the right pen this notebook is fine. I won't work with wet fountain pens
customer_reviews.text: With the right pen this notebook is fine. It won't work well with wet fountain pens, but Fine/Extra Fine fast drying ink or Signo gel pens work great for me. I'm on my third.
customer_reviews.author: armada68

customer_reviews.title: Has a date line in each page
customer_reviews.text: Bleh! Really irked that this one has a date line at the top of each page. No where in the description or pictures was this noted. I still love my LT and it’ll do but not what I expected. I wanted the plain squared pages like all my other LT notebooks.
customer_reviews.author: RNunez

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift for my daughter and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter and she loves it. Uses it daily for bullet journaling. High quality cover and paper.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Best Softcover Notebook Available
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep track of my day to day tasks. That fell through (Thanks iPhone...) but I still use it just for notes in settings where phones are frowned upon. Soft cover is great. The number pages, contents, and overall quality are excellent. Much better than any other journal I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Alec G.

customer_reviews.title: its soft and and feels nice right from the get-go
customer_reviews.text: The pages are thick enough that gel ink doesn't bleed, its soft and and feels nice right from the get-go. It's the perfect size for being compact but still usable (not too small).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley-Rahne S. MacGabhann

customer_reviews.title: ... be a little more opaque - print quality is fine - great format and layout
customer_reviews.text: clean - professional looking - paper could be a little more opaque - print quality is fine - great format and layout.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect. Just the right number of pages per book
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. Just the right number of pages per book. I use the "graph" paper but would rather a plain page. Very light to carry around with me.............Enjoy this for taking daily notes. Use a smaller soft sided Leuchttrum with which to travel.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: I love this notebook
customer_reviews.text: I love this notebook. It is easy to lay the pages flat. It's slim and the pages are smooth. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bullet journal
customer_reviews.text: I needed a notebook to use as a bullet journal. This fit the bill perfectly. Seems to be high quality. If you need a softcover notebook with numbered pages and a table of contents, this one works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: agent orange

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Soft cover. Perfect for Bullet Journal. The grid is light colored and yet easy to see. This is my Go To for journaling. Price point is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Stefuny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to start bullet journalling. Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Z

customer_reviews.title: ... now bought 3 of these and I am in love with them
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 3 of these and I am in love with them! The soft cover makes it easy to carry around, which I take them to and from work with me 5 days a week. They have held up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really love this notebook. I had seen it on tumblr used as a bullet book and I was intrigued. So i bought it and it came in three days earlier than I had anticipated. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aliana

customer_reviews.title: Made for a great bullet journal
customer_reviews.text: Made for a great bullet journal. Good quality pages. Sadly, the covers are a little weak and peel after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's cool how it comes with numbered pages and spine and cover stickers for labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Zwhit

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely happy with the quality of this journal
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with the quality of this journal. I love the squared pages. The printed squares are light so they are not distracting but are helpful in keeping things neat and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this very much for someone who really looks for the little details and quality in a notebook the pages and wonderful and I'm really going to need this for organization :)
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Just wish it was bigger and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just wish it was bigger and had more pages.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Favorite notebook for bullet journaling
customer_reviews.text: Flexible but sturdy cover, lightweight but strong, squared paper is so versatile too. I use this everyday and it lasts me over three months and by then I've ordered the same notebook as I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: i truly do not understand all the reviews raving about how this notebook is far superior to moleskine
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace my old moleskine. i truly do not understand all the reviews raving about how this notebook is far superior to moleskine. the cover felt like cardstock. the page numbers and dates on each page felt too formal and somewhat cheap. maybe it's just me. ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: I fell totally in love with these notebooks
customer_reviews.text: I fell totally in love with these notebooks. I've been a Moleskine loyalist but Leuchtturm notebooks are step above Moleskine. More room per page, an index in the beginning of the notebook and numbered pages! I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bing

customer_reviews.title: The Best for Journaling
customer_reviews.text: I love this notebook. The paper is great quality, the book itself remains open when flat on its spine. Great for writing journals and/or bullet journals. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jason White

customer_reviews.title: Bad paper quality
customer_reviews.text: The paper is so thin; it reminds me of tracing paper. I have to skip every other page even when using pencil to be able to read my work. All of my pens bleed through including my gel pens, so it is beyond useless for my fountain pens.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: but I do love the paper it's made of and style
customer_reviews.text: I thought a large would be large. It was half the size I wanted/expected, but I do love the paper it's made of and style.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Parkison

product_meta.title: Leuchtturm1917 Medium A5 Softcover Squared Notebook- 121 Numbered Pages, Black
product_meta.description: The notebook with a flexible cover. Light and soft to the touch. Leuchtturm helps you get organized with numbered pages and a blank table of contents in each book and a set of stickers for the cover that allow for clear labeling and archiving. High quality 80 gsm paper ensures that fountain pens and roller balls can be used without bleeding through the page. Thread-bound binding allows notebook to lay flat. Includes 8 perforated, detachable sheets and expandable pocket inside back cover. Page marker and elastic closure.
feature_bullets: SOFT COVER: All of the features of our hardcover notebooks with a flexible, durable cover
INKPROOF PAPER: Medium A5 notebooks have 80 gsm paper, which is equatable to 60lb stock, and have 121 numbered pages
OPENS FLAT: This thread-bound notebook opens flat so you can write and draw at all angles without compromising the integrity of the spine
ELASTIC CLOSURE BAND: Secure your content with the elastic enclosure band and inner gusseted pocket. Page marker is included for easy access to a specific page
VARIOUS COLOR OPTIONS: The size and range of colours make  them ideal companions for all walks of life. Includes 8 perforated sheets, a blank table of contents and a gusseted pocket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars105 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
